review: I must admit, i felt a bit skeptical and silly presenting it to my mom in the hopes that it would be the answer to her prayers (she's a traveling PT who has to enter things in her laptop in her car outside of patients' houses every day), as it looks and feels like the sort of bulky, plastic, Playskool product that would be part of a kid's toy, or booster seat.  But, it just goes to show how you shouldn't pass judgment based on appearances, cuz the thing fits securely on her steering wheel (as if it came with it), and has literally changed my mother's life.I will say that my mother's work-issued laptop is definitely on the smaller side (roughly iPad-sized ), so i can't vouch for the tray's effectiveness with more standard-sized models, but for my mother's purposes, it's worked like a dream :-)
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (gray)
